node.title: NPC Championship semi-final: ManawatÅ« v Otago at Palmerston North - Live
node.description: Join us from 7pm for all the action from Central Energy Trust Arena.
node.content: ["Kia ora and welcome to Newshub's live coverage, as\u00a0Manawat\u016b and Otago face off to claim the first spot in the NPC Championship final.", "Winners of two of their past three games, the southerners enter the contest as betting favourites against a Turbos team which heads into the finals on a three-game losing streak.", "The teams last met in early October, when\u00a0Manawat\u016b handily dealt with Otago by a scoreline of 27-14.", "Whoever emerges victorious will advance to next Friday's final, where the winner of the second semi-final between Taranaki and Southland in Inglewood on Saturday will await.", "We'll have all the live action for you from 7pm.", "TAB betting odds: Manawat\u016b - $2.35, Otago - $1.54", "Team line-ups:", "Manawat\u016b: 1-Harrison Allan, 2-Ray Niuia, 3-Flyn Yates, 4-Micaiah Torrance-Read, 5-Ofa Tauatevalu, 6-TK Howden, 7-Shamus Hurley-Langton, 8-Brayden Iose, 9-Logan Henry, 10-Brett Cameron, 11-Ed Fidow, 12-Jason Emery, 13-Josiah Marakau, 14-Tima Fainga'anuku, 15-Nehe Milner-Skudder", "Reserves: 16-Ben Strang, 17-Jason Gavigan, 18-Darius Mafile'o, 19-Vaikoso Poloniati, 20-Johnny Galloway, 21-Griffin Culver, 22-James Tofa, 23-Drew Wild", "Otago: 1-Josh Hohneck, 2-Liam Coltman, 3-Jermaine Ainsley, 4-Joshua Hill, 5-Josh Dickson, 6-Sam Fischli, 7-James Lentjes, 8-Christian Lio-Willie, 9-Kayne Williamson, 10-Josh Ioane, 11-Vilimoni Koroi, 12-Patelesio Tomkinson, 13-Matt Faddes, 14-Freedom Vahaakolo, 15-Sam Gilbert", "Reserves: 16-Ricky Jackson, 17-Abraham Pole, 18-Tau Kolomatangi, 19-Fabian Holland, 20-Slade McDowall, 21-James Arscott, 22-Cameron Millar, 23-Raymond Nu'u", "\u00a0"]
